website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost, brightly colored crew neck shirt suitable for some work situations.
pros: Fabric is designed to stay cool
Reflective tape and bright fabric color helps with visibility
cons: The reflector band is too tight on some wearers
This shirt may be better for those with a slimmer build

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shirts
customer_reviews.text: These Safety Shirts are PERFECT. They hold screen printing well for our logo and also keep the crew cool! I tend to order a size up due to the reflective pieces being a tad tight on the guy's midriff. Other than that, so far so great!! The guys love them and they prevent having to wear the annoying vests all day long, up and down ladders. These shirts have proved their worth to us! We will always purchase from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: love these shirts over having to wear a vest
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU. Ordered 4 of these ANSI CLASS 2 shirts and very comfortable, lightweight and breathable. Currently employed with Amazon in OB Dock loading. Got to say so much easier wearing these shirts than having to wear a tshirt with a vest over it all day. Gets very warm and these shirts make it so much more cooler, breathable and flexibility of movement and no worries of vest getting caught in the roller lines.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E Moore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Shirts are great. They breath well and definitely are visible Day and night. I would like to see shirts go tag less! Most companies require tags on shirts for safety standards verification. It would be awesome if it was an imprinted tag. This sounds petty but for a worker it drives them crazy as you start moving and sweating. All around great shirt though.
customer_reviews.author: Lostboy

customer_reviews.title: good price, good fit and good quality
customer_reviews.text: i need these for work almost on any construction site now. these fit as expected. they wick sweat well and are breathable. iv bought multiple times and relatively cheap
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Minchen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: First perfectly I sleep walk and tend to go outside so now my son can find me
customer_reviews.author: mona brock

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for whole crew
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to try out and everyone else wanted some, so ended up ordering them for my whole crew so we don't have to wear vests. These are way cooler, more comfortable, and don't get caught on everything like the more expensive vests.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J.

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Too hot to work in during short sleeve weather, doesn't breathe.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Very good value, I'll definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt for a really good price. The necks a little snug but still a great value. I machine wash and LINE DRY to extend the life of the shirts. They dry very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: HA Shevak

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: decent quality , lite weight perfect for work . would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like the moisture wicking feature and the reflective strips have lasted longer than other shirts I have owned that have the glued on strips. My only real problem was the neck fitment. It's a little tight so i had to cut a slit in it so it's more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Armando C.

customer_reviews.title: The lightness of the material
customer_reviews.text: That keep me either warm and cool when need. The light weight material, and the brightness of the reflector lines.
customer_reviews.author: alanna turnbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt. I just wish I would have gotten a larger size. It fits a little tight
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Bright and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the shirt, comfortable and colorful. If they can't see me with this on, their eyes aren't open! I'm going to order a long sleeved one now, if one is available?
customer_reviews.author: William H. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. fits and feels comfortable. I bought for work. I work on construction having this shirt on keeps me a lot cooler than wearing a nylon safety vest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I work outside and the shirt stays dryer than wearing a regular shirt with Safety Vest.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Diodati

customer_reviews.title: Fits to size .good material
customer_reviews.text: I have to ware a safety vest in this heat ..Not now..much cooler ...perfect size and the material is great good but for the money..thanks prime
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase..
customer_reviews.text: Really great product and quality for the price just as described..
customer_reviews.author: Jose Perez

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The shirt was just loose around the torso. But the fabric light weight and breathable but rips easily. But then again I ran into some strut. But good for the price save 3 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Damari Corral

customer_reviews.title: Would diff buy again
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shirts light easy to clean dry fast very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Miguel J.

customer_reviews.title: Order next size up.
customer_reviews.text: Work in hot and muggy weather, these work out very. Well will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: J.R. W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and moisture wicking, would buy again and recommend
customer_reviews.author: VMoney

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The stitch on reflective tape came off after about 12 washes.
customer_reviews.author: dawn m. grapentin

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and don't sweat a lot in it
customer_reviews.text: The ability to work in it , comfortable and don't sweat a lot in it.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte ann lucas wooten

customer_reviews.title: Great hi-vis shirt for bike commuting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shirt when I decided to try bicycle commuting to work. After reading the reviews on sizing and lack of "stretchabiliy" of the reflective stripes, I decided to go with a size Large and it fits just right. I usually wear medium T-shirts and my suit coats are size 44. This shirt can definitely be seen, judging by the way drivers act when near me. As I start commuting more often I will definitely buy more of these shirts.
customer_reviews.author: bweaver

product_meta.title: JORESTECH Safety T Shirt Reflective High Visibility Short Sleeve Yellow/Lime ANSI Class 2 Level 2 Type R TS-01 (L)
product_meta.description:
Size:Large

Be safe, comfortable, and sharp-looking with JORESTECH line of high visibility apparel. These ANSI compliant crewneck T-Shirts deliver high standards of safety through enhanced reflectivity. Crafted with breathable, fast-drying, bird’s eye knit fabric with moisture-wick technology. Equipped with convenience chest pocket to place ID badge or corporate logo imprints, this T-Shirt will ensure that you and your company are easily noticed and identifiable, while looking sharp in safety and comfort.

Their rugged construction and design make these garments perfect for indoor and outdoor use. Ideal for use at the office, and for highway road work, sports, construction, transportation, utilities, surveying, manufacturing, by emergency responders, as well as casual wear where safety is a plus. JORESTECH line of high visibility safety wear provides a comfortable fit, function, and style.

Safety Features: 

 * Meets stringent ANSI/ISEA 107-2015 Class 2 Type R standards, where personal visibility is the highest priority or in environmental conditions where visibility is heavily compromised
 * Hi visibility fluorescent lime-yellow reflective material, remains effective during daylight and night time hours
 * Sewn-in 2-inch (500mm) ANSI/ISEA 107-2015 compliant silver reflective tapes. 
 * 360° of reflective coverage
 * Crew neck

Comfort Features: 

 * Crafted from sweat-wicking fast-dry 100% Polyester 130 GSM bird eye knit fabric; for a drier, cooler, comfortable experience
 * Functional convenience front pocket with no reflective materials to mount ID or corporate logo
 * Short sleeves
 * Machine washable
feature_bullets: ANSI/ISEA 107-2015 Type R Class 2, 2” silver sewn reflective tape
130 GMS bird eye fabric to help stay cool

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
